required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of SYHX1901 Tablets in Chinese Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blinded, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Single Ascending Dose (SAD) and Multiple Ascending Dose (MAD) Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of SYHX1901 Tablets in Chinese Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase I clinical trial to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetic characteristics of single ascending doses and multiple ascending doses of SYHX1901 tablets in Chinese healthy subjects

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetic characteristics of single ascending doses (part 1) and multiple ascending doses (part 2) of SYHX1901 tablets in Chinese healthy subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability of SYHX1901 tablets
primary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: up to14 days after the dosing, MAD: up to 7 days after the last dosing
primary_outcome.description: The safety and tolerability of single or multiple doses of SYHX1901 tablets administered orally will be assessed by incidence and severity of adverse events (AEs), abnormalities in clinical laboratory assessments, ECGs, vital sign assessments, and physical exams.

secondary_outcome.measure: The PK of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses

secondary_outcome.measure: The PK of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses

secondary_outcome.measure: The PK of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: The concentration peak time of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses Concentration peak time The peak time of SYHX1901 concentration following single-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: The PK of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: The half-time of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses The half - time of SYHX1901 following single-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: The PK of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: The plasma clearance rate （CL）of SYHX1901 following single-dose and multiple doses

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the dose（180 mg）
secondary_outcome.description: Urine pharmacokinetic parameters: The Urine clearance rate （CLr）of SYHX1901

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the dose（180 mg）
secondary_outcome.description: Urine pharmacokinetic parameters: Cumulative excretion from time t1 to t2(Aet1-t2) Fecal pharmacokinetic parameters:Cumulative excretion from time t1 to t2 Urine pharmacokinetic parameters:cumulative excretion from time t1 to t2

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the dose（180 mg）
secondary_outcome.description: Fecal pharmacokinetic parameters: cumulative excretion from time t1 to t2(Aft1-t2)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the dose（180 mg）
secondary_outcome.description: It is a prospective study aiming to characterize metabolites of 1901 in human plasma, urine and feces. The metabolism profiles of 1901 and main metabolites will be build up.

secondary_outcome.measure: PD indexes: the level of PSTATs in blood cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacodynamic indexes: the level of PSTATs in blood cells

secondary_outcome.measure: PD indexes: the inhibition rate of PSTATs in blood cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple timepoints up to 144 hours after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Pharmacodynamic indexes: the inhibition rate of PSTATs in blood cells

arm_group.description: Two subjects will be enrolled in a single dose group which is recommended as the initial dose. 8 out of 10 healthy subjects will be randomized to receive a single dose of SYHX 1901 tablets in fasted state.
2 out of 10 healthy subjects will be randomized to receive a single dose of placebo in fasted state
8 out of 10 healthy subjects will be randomized to receive multiple doses of SYHX 1901 tablets in fasted state
2 out of 10 healthy subjects will be randomized to receive multiple doses of placebo in fasted state

intervention.description: SYHX 1901, oral tablets, in fasted state
Matching placebo, oral tablets, in fasted state
